**01** Reached 50 kg by the end of the March. Currently at 53 kg **02** 5 days of 18/6 IF with 2 days of 24H a week **03** I'll report only what are noticeable changes ie. weight, feeling during the fast etc.

How was your menstruation? I remember when I tried IF in 2014, my period became regular (I have a irregular period which is one of the symptoms of PCOS) I was only diagnosed with PCOS later last year. That time I already stopped IF and my menstruation back to irregular. Now, Im doing 18/6 IF again for almost 3 months now to see if my menstruation will be back to normal again.

Im currently reading Sputnik Sweetheart by Haruki Murakami. Its a story of a guy who is in love with his lesbian best friend. Im trying to read it slowly and intensively as I really want to understand it thoroughly. What I like about this book is, I feel like I am eating a bread for the first time after being hungry for so long. That's how I describe it.
This is the first book I read after being on hiatus for almost a year. And Im reading this book for almost a month now despite this being a short novel. I hope I can finish this week.

I believe a recovery day/day off is essential in a workout especially if you're doing HIIT. I heard in one of Tim Ferris's podcast episodes, about the one minute workout, Martin Gibala was suprised when he saw more progress in the group that gets recovery days (in his study). Here is the link of the [podcast](http://tim.blog/2017/01/23/the-one-minute-workout-designed-by-scientists-dr-martin-gibala/) listen at 27:44.

For 1. I started doing this for the past few weeks but instead of describing the whole thing, I just speak one sentence and that's it. Maybe I could start adding more sentences and do it more frequently.
For 2, I really enjoy listening to podcast so I think this is easy. I also set my browser's page at work to bbc news so I wont forget listening to it eveytime I work.
Being an introvert and shy, its really hard for me to socialize. When I was little, If I feel like a person doesn't like me or doesn't want to be friends with me, I will stay away from that person immediately. This is my defense mechanism as a child and still using it as an adult. I think this contributed a lot to my lack of social skills.

I joined my other coworkers during lunch this past few weeks and try myself to engage in their conversations. Its hard but im getting used to it.

Muntikan na ko meron maka-holding hands sa LRT kanina. Jam-packed kasi kanina yung tren tapos biglang huminto. Hahawak sana ako sa kanya tapos sabay din na hahawakan nya sana ako para di matumba. Tapos mukang pareho namin na-realize na magkakahawakan kami ng kamay midway. Mukang may mga 5 secs din yun na parang nagkatitigan kami tapos biglang naging awkward. Umarte na lang ako na parang walang pake pero deep inside "oh shit that was close" hahaha

I didn't talk to anyone. I ignored my family and friends. When they invited me to hang out, I declined. I didn't respond to their messages. I spent most of my days in bed or watching anime. So basically, I shut myself into my own world. Sinapuso ko ata yung quote ni Haruki Murakami na " 'I've built a wall around me, never letting anybody inside and trying not to venture outside myself'"
When me and my mother fought, that's the time I realized I have to pull myself together. That I am lucky enough to have a loving family like them.
I am recovering now from depression. Running was a big help. Though I feel lonely/sad sometimes, pero di na katulad dati na wala akong will to live.
New girl crush - Kim Go Eun

Me! 16/8 Daily fasting. My feeding window is 7am-3pm, no dinner. Lost almost 3kg in 1 month though sinasamahan ko siya ng takbo. Kaya lang parang natigil na pagbawas ko ng timbang saka minsan nabe-break ko fasting ko usually pag weekend.

WRITING.TITLE: Gals of BeautyTalkPh, I need your help!
WRITING.TEXT:
Hi Gals,
Late bloomer here. I just started to become conscious about myself, specially the way I dress and move. I want to be more feminine which means I should wear more skirts and dresses. I am kinda boyish and manang so most of my clothes are either t-shirt or long sleeves. Please help me as I don't have a good fashion sense and TBH I don't know where to start.
If you can recommend any instagram users for inspirations, that would be helpful.
Edit: Thanks girls for taking the time to help me. I really appreciate all your comments and advice. I will consider all your suggestions. Maraming maraming salamat
I was diagnosed with nodular goiter in 2014 but I managed to reduce the size through running and a healthy lifestyle. Then last month, I was diagnosed with PCOS. My OB advised me to lose weight.
The Perks of Being a Wallflower
Taking a nap at around 5 pm is not a good idea.

Started running in 2014 right after I was diagnosed with nodular goiter (benign). For almost 3 years, I managed to reduced the size of the node and make my TSH get back to normal level and its all thanks to running and healthy lifestyle. Right now, Im preparing for my half marathon next month. My running shoes is almost 6 months old now. I would like to try Mizuno this time.
Mobile9
Inis ako sa mv nyan kasi wala man lang close up si Chungha my love
Im planning to do my first ever full marathon next year. Still researching and looking for training plan that suits me but for now, Im preparing for my half marathon on January.
No, saka pansin ko walang nagtatanong sakin kung bakit ako single. Obvious na ata sa kanila ang sagot LOL
Cafe Mocha ng Pan de Manila saka [Great taste white](https://imgur.com/g7Q2sLw)
What piece of advice would you like to give yourself right now?

From MRT North Ave. 1. Take MRT North Ave. Station. 2. Get off at Cubao Station. 3. Go to LRT 2 via Gateway Mall. 4. Take LRT 2 and get off at V Mapa station.
Note: common point nila is V Mapa station. You can also visit Cinema 76 fb page. They provided directions and maps. I hope this helps.
I haven't found someone who has the same wavelength as me. And also, Im awkward irl.

From Monumento, 1.Take LRT 1(Monumento Station) and get off at Doroteo Jose station 2. Take LRT 2 (Recto Station) 3. Get off at V. Mapa Station 4. Depart on to Ramon Magsaysay 5. From V. Mapa, ride a jeepney going to Pasig. 6. Get off at Luna Mencias st. (left side) Landmark is Big Guys Pizza on the left and Dumlao Gym at the right. 7. Walk up the street until you pass by the intersection of Luna Mencias and Araullo st. 8. Cinema 76 is at the right side at the TBA Bldg Edit: line breaks

Yung Paymaya ko pang beep card narin. Kaya ayun, madalas ko syang nagagamit sa pagsakay ng LRT at MRT. Nagagamit ko rin sya pagloload ng cellphone saka nagamit ko rin sya dati noong nag-booked ako sa hotel.

Maybe because my view of LGBT expands? Not sure. But I think it really all started when my sister came out to me 2 months ago.

WRITING.TITLE: Girls holding hands
WRITING.TEXT:
So today I went to the mall and saw girls holding hands together. I saw 3 couples in total. Im not sure if they were just being too friendly or they are actually a couple since skinship is quite usual in my country.
PS, I took a picture of this 2 friends (I only pictured their back) because they look cute together and the Yuri fan inside of me was screaming LOL :D
